titleStmt.title: Arguments exhibited in Parliament by Sir Nicholas Bacon, Lord Keeper of the Great Seale of England ; whereby it is proved that the persons of noble men are attachable by law for contempts by them committed in the Right Honorable Court of Chancery for disobeying the decrees of that court.
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Nicholas, Sir, 1509-1579.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library and Thomason Collection, British Library.
